overview:
Sanjay Vakil is the founder and leader of LuckyCal. Previously, he cofounded PatientKeeper (http://patientkeeper.com), a venture-backed company making medical information available securely on multiple handheld devices.

While founding Patientkeeper, Sanjay was completed his doctorate (on aircraft cockpit displays) at MIT. During his undergrad years at MIT, Sanjay helped run 6.270, the LEGO robotics class and had a five year run as a radio show host at WMBR.

After PatientKeeper, Sanjay joined AmbientDevices, where he was responsible for the AmbientClock (http://ambientclock.com), which planted the seeds for LuckyCal, along with other products.

LuckyCal is Sanjay’s third startup as a founder.
